# L85 Point Defense Autocannon
A light 20mm [color=gold]ballistic[/color] autocannon designed for rapid fire and suppressing smaller targets at close range.
## Gun Specifications
- Firerate: [color=crimson]720 RPM[/color] ([color=deepskyblue]12 RPS[/color]) - Sell Value: [color=greenyellow][bold]250 Spesos[/bold][/color] - Muzzle Velocity: [color=orange]180 m/s[/color] - Range: [color=orange]180m[/color] - Power Usage (Passive): [color=turquoise]100u/s[/color] - Capacitor Storage: [color=turquoise]20000u[/color] - Capacitor Recharge: [color=turquoise]550u/s[/color] - Capacitor Fire Cost: [color=turquoise]15u[/color] - Firing Mode: [color=gold]Automatic[/color]
